inputs.selection_motivation: Euro Stoxx 50’s performance is tightly linked to euro currency strength; EURUSD is the primary handle for euro area equity exposure, so a correlation link enables cross‑asset analytics and LLM reasoning.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Euro Stoxx 50 is a European equity index, so its performance is driven by European macro fundamentals, monetary policy, and global risk sentiment. Topics that directly influence or are highly correlated with the index include European inflation, ECB policy, German sovereign yields, and global equity benchmarks. Fed policy and US Treasury yields affect global risk appetite and thus the index, while the USD‑related FX topics (DXY, EURUSD) capture currency exposure that can sway the index’s valuation. Commodity prices (gold, copper, oil) and the US 10‑year Treasury yield are also strong correlates through risk‑on/risk‑off dynamics.

proposed_link.motivation: Euro Stoxx 50’s performance is tightly linked to euro currency strength; EURUSD is the primary handle for euro area equity exposure, so a correlation link enables cross‑asset analytics and LLM reasoning.
